attributes.action: I want the UK Gov to make up the $8m Paralympic budget shortfall.
attributes.background:
The IPC is $8m short of funding for the travel arrangements of smaller nations to send teams to Rio Paralympics. 

I would like the UK Gov or Lottery to make up the shortfall and not let the momentum of London 2012 be lost.

rejection.details:
The open petition on a similar issue is here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/164927
